title.narrative: Korean JPO for Organizational Design, Post Management & Classification

description.narrative: Under the overall authority of HRM/DIR and Chief HRM/SLD, and the immediate supervision of Head of HRM/SLD/OPC, the JPO will play an important role in the Organization's talent management function, participating in the development of the WKFP framework (dashboards, demographic templates, findings, inventories, tools, procedures and timeframes), the assessment of the pilot WKFP exercise, its operationalization and continuous refinement to meet the evolving organizational needs. The JPO will also actively participate in the development and introduction of innovative HR practices to support WKFP and talent management function (career mapping/paths, job sharing, job swapping, job shadowing).
